p: As depicted in Table 1, there was a dose-dependent reduction in the percentage of mean fecal output among all tested doses of the crude extract Ruta chalepensis with 400 mg/kg.bw tested dose showing the highest effect (34%). Similarly, the crude leaves extract Vernonia amygdalina showed the maximum effect (31%) at the highest tested doses (400 mg/kg.bw) to lessen the percentage of mean fecal output ( Table 2).
